import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Flex, Heading, Center, Stack, Input, useToast, Grid, GridItem, Button, Badge, Text, Box, Image, useColorMode, useColorModeValue, extendTheme } from '@chakra-ui/react' import * as PokemonActions from '../actions/pokemonSearch.actions'; import '../App.css'; const PokemonCard = ({ name, id, xp, height, weight, image, type }) => { return (
{name.toUpperCase()} {type}
ID# {id} XP {xp} Height {height} Weight {weight}
) } export default PokemonCard
